doc.title: Brain Zapped
doc.plot: The local library has taken on a new, but strange and unexplainable facade. Billowing clouds race past it from above, flashes of light punch out from its windows and perhaps the strangest of all is the impression that the library is alive. When book-lover and all around super-girl, Emily Grace Garcia hears about strange happenings at the local library, she decides to investigate and brings her best friend, Kingston to help. Things seem pretty normal until they witness electric holograms popping out of books and mysterious glowing bookshelves. Emily's curiosity leads to the jolt of her life and she and Kingston are propelled into a world of wonder.
